help-file.title: SPECIALIZATIONS SPECIALIZE
help-file.content:
Upon reaching level 30, you may "specialize" you character, meaning to choose a path or skill-set. After you have decided what specialization you would like to be, you must find the proper "teacher" mob of your class to aid you in your specialization. Then, you must type "spec <specname>" to confirm your choice.
WARNING: Once you specialize it is very difficult to change your choice! It requires a specific quest and 50 epics.
NOTE: Not all classes have specializations available. Use help <specname> for information on a specific specialization.
